scripts.migrate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.seed: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.seed:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.seed:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.db:reset:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:rollback && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.db:reset:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:rollback --all && npm run migrate:test && npm run seed:test
scripts.db:reset:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex --knexfile ./knexfile.ts migrate:rollback && npm run migrate:prod && npm run seed:prod
